attributes.action: reduce the UK driving age to 16!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The driving age should be reduced to 16. Imagine how long a bus would take us when all of us 16 year olds that work and go to college. If the government reduce the drving age to 16. It would be extremely helpful, Or at least reduce the age to practice drving on a public road to 16 and after passing to 17.
